query.description: Filter tasks by a search term in their title or description. This performs a partial match.
Filter tasks by their priority level.
The column to sort tasks by. Allowed values: `title`, `description`, `priority_level`, `status`, `deadline_at`, `started_at`, `completed_at`, `created_at`. Defaults to `created_at`.
The direction to sort tasks by. Allowed values: `asc`, `desc`. Defaults to `desc`.
The page number of the paginated results.

variable.description: The ID of the project whose tasks are to be retrieved.

request.description: Retrieve a paginated list of tasks associated with a specific project.
Store a newly created task in storage.
Display the specified task.
Update the specified task in storage.
Remove the specified task from storage.

item.name: List of statuses and priority levels

response.body: {"status":200,"data":{"statuses":["not started","in progress","completed","on hold","blocked"],"priorityLevels":["low","medium","high","urgent"]},"message":"Statuses and priority levels retrieved successfully"}

query.description: Filter teams by a search term in their name. This performs a partial match.
The column to sort teams by. Allowed values: `title`, `description`, `priority_levels`, `status`, `deadline_at`, `started_at`, `completed_at`, `created_at`. Defaults to `created_at`.
The direction to sort teams by. Allowed values: `asc`, `desc`. Defaults to `desc`.

request.description: Retrieve a paginated list of teams with optional search and sorting functionality.

Display the specified team.

A search term to filter members by name or email.
